WRITING.TITLE: Friendly reminder for Flashpoint Constructed and redeemable codes
WRITING.TEXT: If you haven't done so yet, don't forget to sign up for this weekend's Flashpoint Constructed tournament being hosted by 983 Media. There will be coin, mythril, and cash prizes available. You can learn more here: [https://twitter.com/983tv/status/1308413877437243395](https://twitter.com/983tv/status/1308413877437243395) Don't forget to redeem the "LetTheGamesBegin" code for 5 free Rings of Immortality packs if you haven't done it yet. New players who did not redeem a treat code last year can also use the code "WelcomeChallenger" for 10 packs each of both the Core and Rings of Immortality sets, as well as 2 unowned Paths, 2 unowned Powers and 1 unowned Emote.
It will be streamed and cast on our official Twitch channel. [https://www.twitch.tv/mythgard\_game](https://www.twitch.tv/mythgard_game)

Unfortunately iOS does not allow for code redemption. However, we have cross-play across all platforms so you can redeem a code on our web client and receive your rewards on the platform of your choice.

WRITING.TITLE: Live Balance Change - September 26, 2020
WRITING.TEXT: After listening to feedback from players before, during, and after today's tournament, we realize that Weapon Check was a card many felt to be frustrating to play against. We've chosen to implement a live fix for the card and will continue to watch it closely from here. Should we use this approach in the future, we will be sure to give at least 20 minute warning. Weapon Check All minions have ~~their strength locked to zero~~ #8594; -3/-0 Refunds for people who crafted it before now will be made available before or with the next patch.

Whether it is currently too good or not quite good enough is something we'll continue to monitor and assess. The more pressing matter for us was that regardless of power level, it needed to feel less oppressive. We think this change should definitely help with that feeling and serve as a good place for us to continue to monitor from. Please feel free to leave some feedback for us about the card as we spend more time playing with this new iteration in the coming days.
We've definitely heard and understand the frustrations with menu navigation since the latest patch and it's something we're taking a closer look at. No details just yet but it's on our radar.

There are currently no other wide-use codes available. However, if you pay attention to the social media channels of the various people in the Mythgard Partner Program you can typically find code giveaways going on from them as well.

WRITING.TITLE: 2v2 Flashpoint Payout Increase
WRITING.TEXT: Don't forget to sign up for this weekend's 2v2 Flashpoint! In the spirit of 2 players to a team we've decided there should be 2 currencies paid out as well. We're happy to say we're adding OVER 3000 Mythril in payouts to the top 8! Be sure to grab your partner and collect some sweet Mythril. *Mythril will be paid out after the tournament via redeemable codes either through Discord or sent to your email address.*

WRITING.TITLE: Expansion 2 Development Update
WRITING.TEXT: We're so happy to see everyone enjoying the Rings of Immortality expansion. We're also proud to announce that the gameplay design for our next expansion will be wrapping up very shortly (possibly as soon as later today) and we have some details to get your minds wandering. We're going to be exploring some "subfactions" within the various factions in Mythgard. I hear that the Orange subfactions are "The Resistance", "Magic of the Desert", and "Thearchy". You can also expect to see several more Jinns but maybe with a brand new twist!
